pages.text: A $(item)Name Tag$() is an item used to name mobs in the world and prevent them from $(n)despawning$() naturally.
To use a tag, it must first be renamed with an $(item)Anvil$(), costing 1 experience level.

$(n)Easter Eggs:$() $(br)$(li)Most mobs named $(o)Dinnerbone$() or $(o)Grumm$() causes it to render upside-down. $(br)$(li)Naming a $(thing)Sheep$() $(o)jeb_$() causes it's wool to fade between the dye colors, producing a rainbow effect. $(br)$(li)Naming a $(thing)Rabbit$() $(o)Toast$() causes it to hava a special skin. $(br)$(li)Naming a $(thing)Vindicator$() $(o)Johnny$() causes it to be aggressive to all mobs.
